title: Chunky Cool Shoes
description:
The latest and coolest shoes for those people looking to make a statement. Made of space age fabrics combined with a solid, chunky sole means you will stand tall in the crowd.

  • If you know, you know
  • Lace-up fastening
  • Branded tongue and cuff
  • Padded for comfort
  • Chunky sole
  • Moulded tread
